movie_title: Why sitting is bad for health ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction: Could sitting be damaging to our health? Phil and Georgie discuss this and teach you some useful voc

vocabulary.definition: to design or plan in such a way that something is no longer needed
vocabulary.example: The company plans to engineer out the outdated technology from their products.

vocabulary.definition: the movement of blood through the heart and blood vessels which carries oxygen around the body
vocabulary.example: Regular exercise helps improve blood circulation in the body.

vocabulary.definition: organized or designed to support a particular activity or purpose
vocabulary.example: The training program is geared towards enhancing employees' communication skills.

vocabulary.definition: the regular rise and fall of the sea and connected to the phrase 'swim against the tide' meaning to not follow what most people are doing
vocabulary.example: Despite criticism, he continued to swim against the tide and pursue his unique artistic vision.

vocabulary.definition: to review or summarize the main points
vocabulary.example: Before the exam, the teacher will recap the key concepts covered throughout the semester.

vocabulary.definition: agreeing to something or coming to terms with a situation
vocabulary.example: After much deliberation, she finally reached a point of accepting the changes in her life.
